title: IDA Pro "force new variable" for register variable?
content:
IDA Pro 7.2 has a new functionality named force new variable . See: Here and Here .

But it is only efficient for stack-based variables. How can I force a new variable for a register-based variables?

answers_data.content: You can't, not as a standard command that's currently available through the user interface, anyway. Force new variable only works for stack locations. Perhaps a future version of Hex-Rays will allow the user to force new register variables.
